paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the KCNH2 gene variant rs1137617, including clinical significance, penetrance data, and individual records.

patients.demographics: adults (≥19 years of age), diverse ethnic backgrounds

functional_data.summary: The variant rs1137617 in KCNH2 is associated with long QT syndrome.

variants.segregation_data: The variant is associated with the phenotype but segregation data is not provided.
variants.additional_notes: The association was significant with p-discovery = 5.31x10-3 and p-replicating = 1.15x10-3.
key_quotes: Among the novel results consistently associated in both the discovery and replication datasets at the 3-digit level was a variant in KCNH2 (rs1137617) a gene known to cause long QT syndrome with ICD-9 codes 244 'Acquired hypothyroidism'.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward with clear information on the KCNH2 variant.
